record.field: The company %(company)s has no a complete address to add to the file.
The party %(party)s has no any address to add to the file.
The party %(party)s has no a complete address to build the file.
The party %(party)s has no any province assigned at its address
The party %(party)s has no any vat number.
Can not generate export file, there are not payment lines.
The bank account of the company %(company)s is not defined.
The bank account number of the company %(company)s is not correct.
The company "%(company)s" have not any VAT number defined.
The bank account number of the party %(party)s is not defined and current payment journal enforces all lines to have a bank account.
The bank account number of the party %(party)s is not correct.
The payment journal has no norm to build a file.
Unknown error. An error occurred creating the file.
The payment "%(payment)s" doesn\'t have bank account.
The party "%(party)s" doesn\'t have bank account.
Payment process method can not be mixed on payment groups. Payment process "%(process)s" of line "%(payment)s" is diferent from previous payment process "%(pprocess)s"
You can not pay line "%(line)s" because its move "%(move)s" is not posted.'
